welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Waterville! This charming city is known for its beautiful lakes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Waterville has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert Lafleur Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robert Lafleur Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Central Maine Airport of Norridgewock Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Central Maine Airport of Norridgewock Airport, serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Augusta Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for internet access.
